flavorText: Balshan wizards have long used them to gnaw away the memories they wish to forget.

foreignData.flavorText: Balshanische Zauberer nutzten sie lange Zeit, um unerwünschte Erinnerungen wegzunagen.
foreignData.name: Gedankenknabberer
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Deine maximale Handkartenzahl ist um zwei reduziert.

foreignData.flavorText: Los hechiceros de Balshan los han usado desde hace mucho tiempo para deshacerse de los recuerdos que desean olvidar.
foreignData.name: Roepensamientos
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
El tamaño máximo de tu mano se reduce en dos.

foreignData.flavorText: Les sorciers du Balshan les ont longtemps utilisés pour effacer quelques souvenirs indésirables.
foreignData.name: Grignoteur de pensées
foreignData.text:
Vol
La taille maximale de votre main est réduite de deux.

foreignData.flavorText: I maghi di Balshan li usano da tempo per rimuovere i ricordi che vogliono dimenticare.
foreignData.name: Corrodipensiero
foreignData.text:
Volare
Il numero massimo di carte che puoi tenere in mano è ridotto di due.

foreignData.flavorText: Os magos balshanos os têm usado há muito tempo para corroer as memórias que desejam esquecer.
foreignData.name: Mordiscador de Pensamentos
foreignData.text:
Voar
O número máximo permitido de cards em sua mão é reduzido em dois.

name: Thought Nibbler
originalText:
Flying
Your maximum hand size is reduced by two.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you are affected by Cursed Rack (an artifact that sets a player’s maximum hand size to four) and then put Thought Nibbler onto the battlefield, your maximum hand size would be two. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be four.

text:
Flying
Your maximum hand size is reduced by two.
